title: Ryder Cup 2025: USA 0-3 Europe on day one – live updates
summary: Live updates are being provided for the opening foursomes and fourballs at Bethpage Back. Writers are offering hole-by-hole coverage as the event unfolds. Stay tuned for the latest developments.

title: Trump says he hopes ‘there will be others’ after James Comey indictment – live updates
summary: The President emphasizes the pursuit of justice rather than revenge, while expressing hope for further prosecutions. Meanwhile, the ACLU condemns the indictment as a "grotesque abuse of power." The unfolding situation highlights a tension between legal actions and perspectives on justice.

title: Zelenskyy claims reconnaissance drones entered Ukrainian airspace from Hungary –Europe live
summary: Hungary has criticized Ukraine, accusing it of enacting "anti-Hungarian policies." This accusation follows a recent development that has strained relations between the two countries. The tension centers on issues affecting the Hungarian minority in Ukraine.

title: Netanyahu tells UN that Israel ‘must finish the job’ in Gaza after dozens of delegates walk out in protest - Middle East crisis live
summary: Israeli Prime Minister condemned Western nations for supporting Palestinian statehood, following a protest where many delegates walked out of the hall. He criticized their stance as undermining Israel's security and legitimacy. The incident highlights ongoing tensions regarding the Israeli-Palestinian conflict.

title: Trump’s latest tariff threat raises concerns for UK pharmaceuticals
summary: Britain plans to actively discuss with the US regarding potential 100% duties that may affect various industries. This includes not only truck manufacturers but also cabinet makers. The situation underscores ongoing trade tensions between the two countries.
